Title: [Dashboard][Module Navigator]Verify that User can navigate to Job Master successfully
Description: User navigation to Job Master module from dashboard
Precondition: 1. User is logged in to the system; 2. Dashboard is accessible; 3. Job Master module is available
Steps: 1. Locate Job Master button on dashboard; 2. Click on Job Master button; 3. Wait for page navigation to complete; 4. Verify Job Master page loads; 5. Check Job Master module header is visible; 6. Confirm navigation URL changes to Job Master; 7. Validate Job Master functionality is accessible
Expected Result: 1. Job Master button is visible and clickable on dashboard; 2. Click action triggers navigation process; 3. Page navigation completes successfully; 4. Job Master page loads with correct content; 5. Job Master module header displays correctly; 6. URL successfully changes to Job Master module; 7. Job Master functionality is fully accessible and operational
Test Data: Login: Valid credentials; Environment: Production dashboard

Title: [Dashboard][Module Navigator]Verify that User can view online/offline device counts successfully
Description: Display of accurate online/offline device counts below Device Manager
Precondition: 1. User is logged in to the system; 2. Dashboard is accessible; 3. Device Manager section is visible; 4. System has device data available
Steps: 1. Locate Device Manager section on dashboard; 2. Identify online/offline count display area; 3. Observe current online device count; 4. Observe current offline device count; 5. Verify count format displays correctly; 6. Check count accuracy against system data; 7. Validate count updates when device status changes
Expected Result: 1. Device Manager section is visible and accessible on dashboard; 2. Online/offline count display area is clearly visible; 3. Online device count displays accurate number; 4. Offline device count displays accurate number; 5. Count format shows "X ONLINE  Y OFFLINE" clearly; 6. Counts accurately reflect current system device status; 7. Counts update correctly when device status changes
Test Data: Login: Valid credentials; Environment: Production dashboard; Device data available

Title: [Dashboard][Module Navigator]Verify that GPS Analytics icon is visible and accessible
Description: Presence and accessibility of GPS Analytics icon in module card list
Precondition: 1. User is logged in to the system; 2. Dashboard is accessible; 3. GPS Analytics module is available; 4. Module card list is visible
Steps: 1. Locate module card list on dashboard; 2. Identify GPS Analytics icon within the list; 3. Verify GPS Analytics icon is visible; 4. Check icon appears clickable; 5. Confirm icon design matches other modules; 6. Validate icon positioning is correct; 7. Test icon accessibility and interaction
Expected Result: 1. Module card list is visible and accessible on dashboard; 2. GPS Analytics icon is present in the module list; 3. GPS Analytics icon displays clearly and is visible; 4. Icon appears clickable with proper visual feedback; 5. Icon design is consistent with other module icons; 6. Icon positioning follows dashboard layout standards; 7. Icon is accessible and ready for user interaction
Test Data: Login: Valid credentials; Environment: Production dashboard; GPS Analytics module enabled
